plugin_desc: Collects key performance metrics of Tomcat connectors and JVM memory to monitor server resource usage, request processing efficiency, and errors, optimizing system performance.
name: Tomcat

metrics.name: tomcat_connector_request_count
metrics.description: This metric represents the total number of requests processed per second on average by the Tomcat connector in the past 5 minutes, and is used to monitor the request load.

metrics.name: tomcat_connector_processing_time
metrics.description: This metric is used to measure the average per - second change in the time taken by the Tomcat connector to process requests over the past 5 minutes. It can reflect the efficiency of the server in processing requests.

metrics.name: tomcat_connector_max_time
metrics.description: This metric indicates the maximum time taken to process a single request in Tomcat, reflecting the performance of the slowest request.

metrics.name: tomcat_connector_bytes_received
metrics.description:
It represents the number of bytes of data received per second on average by the Tomcat connector in the past 5 minutes.
It can be used to monitor the network traffic load of the Tomcat server.

metrics.name: tomcat_connector_bytes_sent
metrics.description: This metric represents the average number of bytes sent per second by the Tomcat connector in the past 5 minutes, and it is used to monitor traffic and response load.

metrics.name: tomcat_connector_current_thread_count
metrics.description: This metric shows the current number of threads used by the Tomcat connector, used to monitor concurrency capabilities.

metrics.name: tomcat_connector_current_threads_busy
metrics.description: This metric indicates the number of busy threads in the Tomcat connector, used to monitor concurrent processing.

metrics.name: tomcat_connector_max_threads
metrics.description: This metric indicates the maximum number of threads for the Tomcat connector, used to monitor Tomcat's concurrency capabilities.

metrics.name: tomcat_connector_error_count
metrics.description: This metric represents the average number of errors per second that occur when the Tomcat connector processes requests in the past 5 minutes, and it is used to monitor the error rate.

metrics.name: tomcat_jvm_memory_free
metrics.description: This metric shows the free memory in Tomcat JVM, used to monitor memory usage.

metrics.name: tomcat_jvm_memory_max
metrics.description: This metric indicates the maximum memory available to Tomcat JVM, used to monitor memory limits.

metrics.name: tomcat_jvm_memorypool_used
metrics.description: This metric shows the amount of memory used in the Tomcat JVM memory pool, used to monitor memory pool usage.
